thread.title: Preview U2’s “Red Hill Mining Town (2017 Mix)”
thread.title_full: Preview U2’s “Red Hill Mining Town (2017 Mix)”

author: James Rettig
title: Preview U2’s “Red Hill Mining Town (2017 Mix)”
text:
James Rettig @jmret | 4:24 pm   
U2’s The Joshua Tree is getting a collector’s edition and tour in honor of its 30th anniversary . A few of the album’s tracks also are getting new mixes/remixes, which will be included on the forthcoming box set. Steve Lillywhite’s new 2017 mix of “Red Hill Mining Town” will also get an individual 12″ picture disc release during this year’s Record Store Day , and U2 has shared a preview video of the vinyl being cut alongside the updated version of the track. Watch and listen below.
